summary: Completed comprehensive testing of The Idea Board application. Backend APIs working perfectly (14/14 tests passed). Critical frontend routing issue identified: /app route not properly rendering IdeaBoard component, showing landing page instead. Real-time polling functionality cannot be fully tested due to routing issue.

integration_issues.issue: IdeaBoard component not rendering on /app route - shows landing page content instead
integration_issues.impact: CRITICAL - Users cannot access the main Idea Board functionality
integration_issues.symptoms: URL shows /app but content displays landing page, preventing access to idea submission and upvoting

passed_tests: Get ideas endpoint with proper sorting (GET /api/ideas)
Landing page loads with hero section and features
CTA buttons functional on landing page
React app root element loads correctly
action_item_for_E1: CRITICAL: Fix React Router configuration for /app route. The IdeaBoard component is not rendering when navigating to /app - instead showing landing page content. This prevents testing of real-time multi-user functionality, idea submission, upvoting, and character limits. Check App.js routing configuration and ensure IdeaBoard component is properly imported and rendered.
